30 Linear Algebra
This (augmented) matrix is in a convenient form, the row-echelon formrow-echelon form
(REF). Reverting this compact notation back into the explicit notation with
the variables we seek, we obtain
x1 − 2x2 + x3 − x4 + x5 = 0
x3 − x4 + 3 x5 = −2
x4 − 2x5 = 1
0 = a+ 1
. (2.45)
Only for a= −1 this system can be solved. A particular solution isparticular solution
